actions.id: Do a rapid diagnostic test (RDT) for malaria
If RDT is positive, give oral antimalarial AL
Counsel caregiver on feeding or refer the child to a supplementary feeding programme, if available
Do a rapid diagnostic test (RDT) for malaria
If RDT is positive, give oral antimalarial AL
Counsel caregiver on feeding or refer the child to a supplementary feeding programme, if available
Do a rapid diagnostic test (RDT) for malaria
If RDT is positive, give oral antimalarial AL
Counsel caregiver on feeding or refer the child to a supplementary feeding programme, if available
Advise caregiver to give more fluids and continue feeding
Advise caregiver on sleeping under a bednet (ITN)
Do a rapid diagnostic test (RDT) for malaria
If RDT is positive, give oral antimalarial AL
Counsel caregiver on feeding or refer the child to a supplementary feeding programme, if available
Advise caregiver to give more fluids and continue feeding
Advise caregiver on sleeping under a bednet (ITN)

reasons: Wait 15 minutes after adding the buffer
Record the time you added the buffer
Put six drops of the buffer into the round hole marked B.
No line in control window C.
Control window C must always have a red line. If it does not, the test is damaged. The results are INVALID.
Advise caregiver WHEN and WHERE next vaccine to be given
If the family cannot bring the child, arrange alternative or visit at home

actions.id: Ask the caregiver to insert the suppository
Assist urgent referral to the nearest health facility
